allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
UI: Compact load cards with collapse feature & improved aircraft headers

- **Load Cards**: Added collapsible view
  - Collapsed: Shows load#, status emoji, timer, slots remaining
  - Expanded: Full details with all info
  - Click anywhere on header to collapse/expand
  - Health indicator shows just colored dot + collapse hint
  
- **Aircraft Headers**: Redesigned for compact multi-aircraft view
  - Shows only last 2 chars of tail number (e.g., "AB")
  - Removed aircraft name/type to save space
  - Compact badges for load count and capacity
  - Single-line layout with all info inline
  
- **Per-Aircraft Load Numbering**: Fixed position calculation
  - Each aircraft now has independent load numbers (1, 2, 3...)
  - Previously used global numbering across all aircraft

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
